name: Stranded Alone (itch) (Tazmen)
description:
A short game I made for Tazmen Jam #3. I had to work throughout most of the dev time again and tried some new stuff that I've never done before with the little time I did have so it's not great but I had a lot of fun making it.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Attack- Left Click

Kill the 3 ghosts to win.
